goal.tools.adapt

Interface Learner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileLearner

    public interface Learner
    To make decisions in adaptive sections of the GOAL program the interpreter consults a Learner. A Learner can make decisions based on past decisions and rewards received from these decisions.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionCombo act(java.lang.String module, MentalState ms, java.util.List<ActionCombo> options)

    • Method Detail

      • act

        ActionCombo act(java.lang.String module,
              MentalState ms,
              java.util.List<ActionCombo> options)
        Selects an action from the list of options. The Learner can make this choice based on the current module, mental state and prior experiences.
        Parameters:
        module - the current module
        ms - the current mental state
        options - from which the learner can choose an action
        Returns:
        the selected action

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String module,
          MentalState ms,
          double reward)
        Update the reward based on the last action.
        Parameters:
        module - the current module
        ms - the current mental state
        reward - the reward for executing the last action selected by act(String, MentalState, List).

      • terminate

        void terminate(MentalState ms,
             java.lang.Double envReward)
        Terminate all learning.
        Parameters:
        ms -
        envReward -
